description: This file defines a React context provider and hook for managing user authentication state, including login, logout, registration, and fetching current user data.

methods.name: useUser()
methods.description: Custom hook to access user context, allowing components to easily retrieve user data and auth status.

methods.name: UserContextProvider({ children })
methods.description: React component that provides user authentication state and methods via context to child components.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Function to perform user login, storing the access token and updating context state.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Function to log out the user, clearing token and user info from state and local storage.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Function to register a new user, storing the received access token and updating context state.
